name: Gearbox
introduce: Gearbox is a composable leverage protocol that improves capital efficiency within DeFi through a novel DeFi primitive, Credit Accounts, which are isolated smart contracts with predefined, whitelisted parameters such as liquidation thresholds and approved tokens.Credit Accounts contain both the user funds and the borrowed margin funds, are deployable on any DeFi protocol, and are non-custodial so users never relinquish ownership of their assets. All operations go through the Credit Accounts which gives users a way to easily traverse the DeFi ecosystem and leverage-interact with whichever protocol they choose.
